author: Special Correspondent
text:
A new super-specialty hospital was unveiled at Nungambakkam on Friday.

The G.G. Super-specialty Hospitals, a 100-bed centre, has been established by Kamala Selvaraj, director of the nearby G.G. Fertility Research Centre, along with her family.

Actor Rekha, her sister, inaugurated the new hospital.

It had all the specialties under one roof, Dr. Kamala said.“We have an emergency casualty unit, an in-house pharmacy and four operation theatres.”

“Our original hospitalbecame renowned for fertility treatment, and then there was no place to cater to other specialties. Also, we have found that as women become pregnant when they are older, they face problems such as diabetes and hypertension and need multi-specialty care,” said Priya Selvaraj, assistant director, G.G. Fertility Research Centre.
title: New super-specialty hospital unveiled
